functionLibrary.name: provisionIAM
functionLibrary.documentation: Set of functions designed to parse or output json objects

script.code:
jsonArray = [] jsonMap = '{'
map.each{ key, value -> jsonArray += '"' + key + '": "' + value + '"' }
jsonMap += jsonArray.join(",") + '}'
log.error("JSON_MAP: {}", jsonMap)
return jsonMap
